fields.subject: Gladminds ASC Registration Passed
fields.body: Mock Key for testing out the email templates

fields.subject: UCN Request
fields.body: Dealer ID {0} has requested for a UCN. Details as follows: Customer ID: {2}  Service type: {1}  Actual kms: {3}  Reason: {4}  Job card url: {5}

fields.subject: Thank you for feedback
fields.body:
We have received your {type}.
 Our team will get back to you soon.

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-GM-{id} Details
fields.body: Your {type} has been assigned to our support team. We will update you by: {due_date}.

fields.subject: Feedback with reference-no-GM-{id} Assign To You
fields.body: Service Desk ticket id: GM-{id} for {type} created on {created_date} has been assigned to you with due date {due_date} Description : {message}

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-GM-{id} Status
fields.body: Your {type} has been resolved. {assign_to} added a comment {comment}

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-{id}
fields.body:
A GladMinds user has a {type} for us, which says:
 {message}.
 It has been reported by {reporter} on {created_date}.

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-GM-{id} resolved
fields.body:
The {type} reported by {reporter} on {created_date} has been resolved.
 The root cause  is {root_cause} and the resolution is {resolution}. The total time spent to resolve the issue is {resolution_time}

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-{id} resolved
fields.body:
The {type} reported by {reporter} on {created_date} has been resolved.
 The root cause was {{root_cause}}

fields.subject: Send Dispatch Feed
fields.body: Request initiated from {2}-{0}. VIN/Frame No. {1} does not exist in GCP database. Request you to send a Dispatch feed for the same.

fields.subject: Thank you for feedback
fields.body:
We have received your {type}.
 Our team will get back to you soon.

fields.subject: Exceeded due date
fields.body: The due date for the ticket which was assigned to {assignee} has been exceeded and the issue is not yet resolved

fields.subject: Exceeded due date
fields.body: The due date for the ticket which was assigned to you has been exceeded . Please address the issue

fields.subject: Reminder for due date
fields.body: The due date for the ticket is {due_date} . Please resolve it soon.
fields.description: Due Date Reminder mail to manager

fields.subject: Change for due date
fields.body: Your {type} will be resolved by{due_date}
fields.description: Due Date change mail to initiator

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-GM-{id} Details
fields.body: Your {type} has been assigned to our support team. We will update you by: {due_date}.

fields.subject: Change for due date
fields.body: Your {type} will be resolved by {due_date}
fields.description: Due Date change mail to dealer

fields.subject: Feedback  with reference-no-GM-{id} Status
fields.body: The {type}  which was reported by {reporter} has been resolved. {assign_to} added a comment {comment}

fields.subject: Consolidated Report : Gladminds Vin Sync Feed Report
fields.body: Please find enclosed, the details of VINs updated in GCP database through online verification requested by various Dealers / ASCs for -

fields.body: Please find the enclosed, customer phone number updates on {date}

fields.subject: Consolidated Report: GladMinds Feed Failure - {feed_type}
fields.body: Please find enclosed, the failure details of {feed_type} on {date}

fields.subject: Loyalty Redemption request {id}
fields.body: Member {member_name} with ID  {member_id} has submitted a redemption request for product '{product_name}', ID-{product_id}. Member Address is: {delivery_address}, {member_city}, {member_state}. You can access the  request at :{url_link}
fields.description: Redemption request Detail mail to assignee

fields.subject: Welcome Kit Delivery - {id}
fields.body: Member {member_name} with ID  {member_id} has successfully registered. Welcome kit with ref ID {id} is to be delivered at: {delivery_address}, {member_city}, {member_state}.
fields.description: Welcome kit Detail mail to assignee

fields.description: Mail to escalation group if due date exceeds
